registrationcodes.applicationsPanelEntryLabel=Registration codes
registrationcodes.create.need=You need first to {0} log in {1} or {2} register {3} registrationcodes.create.submit=Create
registrationcodes.label_active=Active registrationcodes.label_description=Description registrationcodes.label_startDate=Start date registrationcodes.label_endDate=End date registrationcodes.label_addToGroups=Add to the groups registrationcodes.label__actions=Actions registrationcodes.label_users=Users registrationcodes.label_lastUsed=Last used registrationcodes.label_maxUse=Max use registrationcodes.label_code=Registration code registrationcodes.label_emptyvalue=
registrationcodes.tooltip_active=It must be checked to allow usage of the code. registrationcodes.tooltip_description=The description of the code. registrationcodes.tooltip_startDate=The code is refused before this date. registrationcodes.tooltip_endDate=The code is refused after this date. registrationcodes.tooltip_addToGroups=If not empty, the user will be added on the groups on the specified wikis. registrationcodes.tooltip__actions=Actions registrationcodes.tooltip_users=The users who registered this code. registrationcodes.tooltip_lastUsed=The date this code was last used on. registrationcodes.tooltip_maxUse=The code can not be used by more than the specified number of users. registrationcodes.tooltip_code=The registration code.
registrationcodes.create.title=Create a registration code registrationcodes.view.title=Registration code registrationcodes.list.title=List of registration codes registrationcodes.register.title=Register a code registrationcodes.space.title=Registration codes
